description: This file defines the main application component for a Lightning.js based frontend. It sets up the application template, theme-based styles, and routing to the NotesLayout component.

classes.name: Application
classes.description: Main application class from the Lightning.js framework, used to initialize the app.

methods.name: state
methods.description: Returns the initial state for the application, including background color.

methods.name: hooks.ready
methods.description: A hook that executes when the application is ready, setting the page background styles.

methods.name: routes
methods.description: Defines the application routing, linking '/' to the NotesLayout component.
